scripts.worker-importscript: copyfiles --flat node_modules/webnative/dist/**/*.* build/vendor/webnative/ && webpack --config webpack.worker.config.js && copyfiles --flat src/worker-non-module.html build/
scripts.test: rimraf dist && rimraf build && "$npm_execpath" run estrella && "$npm_execpath" run vite && "$npm_execpath" run webpack && "$npm_execpath" run copy-html
